PollImuData
PollImuData

Contains the logic for the Poll IMU Data command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_POLL_SENSOR_DATA  - The MipTypes::Command for this command

Functions
buildCommand
static ByteStream buildCommand(
const MipTypes::MipChannelFields &fields
)

Builds the bytes in the command

Parameters
fields
const MipTypes::MipChannelFields&

The <MipTypes::MipChannelFields> to poll. If this is empty, the message format stored on the device will be used.

Returns

A ByteStream that holds the bytes that make up the command
